name: GhostBop
description:
You're in control of a spoopy spirit, but for some reason, it can't seem to really...well...do ghost stuff! Like Fly! And be SCARY! But hey, you have this shiny hammer that's been stuck to you for quite some time. Maybe it can be of use to you...

Controls:

- WD / Left Right Arrows: Move

- Space Key: Jump

- Z or E while FALLING: Hammer Swing

- Hammer Swing BEFORE Landing: A SECRET! (try it for yourself)

This project was made for the AXChibiGameJam2022! Since that jame came under my radar pretty last second, I had to quickly scrounge up some things to get this out! So it might be a little short, but I'm a big fan of the ideas in here. Also, this jam was a perfect entry point into using Godot!

Credits:

- Programming, Art, Level Design: Myself

- Music

  - Minimal Inspiring Ambient

- SFX

  - Cartoon jump

 - Vibrating Thud

 - Game FX #9

  - Cartoon boing

- Font

- Chocolate Covered Raindrops

By the way, if you love source control, this project is available on my GitHub here! https://github.com/maishiroma/AXChibiGameJam2022
